item.title: Volunteer with Sidewalk Warriors | July 3
item.description: Take time to give back during your summer break! Join the CCPD and engage with the local community as we volunteer with Sidewalk Warriors on Thursday, July 3rd from 4:30-8pm. Register and learn more in Handshake and reach out to Dean Burke, burked5@rpi.edu, with questions.

item.title: Saratoga Jazz Festival | June 289
item.description: Date: Saturday, June 28, 2025 11:00 AM - Join us for the Annual Saratoga Jazz Festival! 2 stages and 22 electrifying artists from jazz to funk, blues, indie, and pop. Kick off summer with good times and good vibes. Enjoy craft beer, tasty eats, a fine arts fair, and much more! Free limited tickets and bus transportation available for Saturday, June 28. Tickets will be available for pick up in the Rensselaer Union Admin Office on June 23rd.
item.author: Community

item.title: Don Stevens Retiring
item.description: Happy Retirement to Donny Stevens! After 40 remarkable years of dedication, service, and commitment to RPI, it is hard to imagine this campus without him. Donny’s hard work, kindness, and institutional knowledge have touched countless students and community members. Thank you for giving so much of yourself to make this campus a better place. May your retirement be filled with joy, good health, new adventures, and the relaxation you deserve. You will be missed, but your impact will remain…

item.title: Collegiate Store Offering 20% - 50% Off During Spring Art Sale
item.description: The Rensselaer Collegiate Store is currently hosting its Spring 2025 Art Sale from now through Saturday, June 28, 2025, with sale items available both in-store and online. While supplies last, customers can save 20% off select art supplies, 40% off select brushes, and 50% off paper and canvas! Note that this sale excludes clearance items, art kits, metals, and jewelry, and cannot be combined with other coupons or discounts.

item.title: Center of Gravity Summer 25 - Get Pulled In!
item.description:
Center of Gravity returns Wednesdays 3–10 pm as a one-stop for summer success: TA Office Hours (3–8 pm), Food service (until 8pm), CCPD workshops (4–6 pm), RecWell activities (4–6 pm), Mental Floss (6–7 pm), study spaces (4–10 pm), Peer Tutoring (7–9 pm), Sunset & Snacks (8–9 pm). Weekly activities include chair massages, therapy dogs, time-management workshops, away-semester prep, art therapy, book giveaways, networking nights, and more. Visit https://success.studentlife.rpi.edu/cog

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
